Title: Ding
Writer: William Wheeler, Ann Biderman (created by), Gina Welch (staff writer), Lenore Zion (staff writer)
Actors: Liev Schreiber, Paula Malcomson, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok
Plot: Ray isn't happy with Paige Finney, played by Katie Holmes, when she recruits his unique service to protect one of her friends. Lens, a long serving employee of Ray considers leaving the business and Bunchy is tormented.
